sentences.en: Currently, disposables account for about 80% to 85% of the $3 billion-plus annual diaper market.
sentences.cn: 目前，一次性尿布占年销售额30多亿美元的尿布市场的80%至85%左右。

sentences.en: Deficiency, equipment disposable investment big, the parts cost is high.
sentences.cn: 不足之处, 设备一次性投资大, 备件成本高.

sentences.en: Disposable nappies are fairly straightforward to put on.
sentences.cn: 一次性尿布很容易穿上。

sentences.en: Disposable paper bags have been developed.
sentences.cn: 一种用后即可废弃的纸袋被设计出来了.
杰拉尔德的可支配收入很少。

sentences.en: He shaved himself with a disposable razor.
I disposed of people, and I'm disposable.
sentences.cn: 我不尊重他人, 我自己也不值得尊重.

sentences.en: It is more expensive to run a personal stereo on disposable batteries than on rechargeables.
sentences.cn: 随身听使用一次性电池比用充电电池更贵。

sentences.en: It's more hygienic to use disposable paper tissues.
sentences.cn: 使用一次性餐巾纸更为卫生.

sentences.en: Products wanted: Medical disposable products and wooden tongue manufacturing machines.
sentences.cn: 需要货品: 用后即弃的医疗用品及生产木制舌皮╱舌饰的机器.

sentences.en: The advertisement is aimed at people in their 20 s with high disposable incomes.
sentences.cn: 这个广告的对象是那些二十多岁且可支配收入高的人士.

sentences.en: The average per capita disposable income reached 5,160 yuan for city dwellers.
sentences.cn: 城镇居民人均可支配收入达到5160元.

sentences.en: The nation's disposable earnings in 1987 amounted to £86 billion.
sentences.cn: 1987年国民可自由支配收入达到了860亿英镑。

sentences.en: This is a medical supplies company that produces disposable hypodermic syringes.
sentences.cn: 这是一家生产多用途皮下注射器的药材公司.

sentences.en: Zinc carbon batteries are the cheapest types of disposable batteries.
sentences.cn: 碳锌电池是可丢弃式电池中最便宜的一种.

words.tran_cn: 有…倾向的；打算做…的；有某种健康状态的
处置；[心理] 性情；[军] 部署；倾向
处理；配置；使适应（dispose的过去分词）；使有倾向

trans.tran_cn: 一次性的，可任意处理的，用后就抛弃的，免洗的，可供使用的
trans.tran_en: intended to be used once or for a short time and then thrown away

trans.tran_cn: 一次性物品， 不回收物品
trans.tran_en: Disposable products can be referred to as disposables
